WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

In the description of SpriteFont+ you state
_The license is totally open so feel free to use it in your commercial or personal projects, etc. No attribution necessary._

In fact the GPLv3 license you provide, is almost unusable in commercial projects. It forces me to publish my game under GPLv3 too, which means I have to publish it free and open source.

Was that your intention? would you mind, publishing it under a less restrictive license, like MIT?
